net.proteusframework.internet.servlet

Class I2RDLog4JConfigListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.internet.servlet.I2RDLog4JConfigListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javax.servlet.ServletContextListener

    public class I2RDLog4JConfigListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.servlet.ServletContextListener
    Log4J configuration listener.
    Use log4JConfigLocation as a context parameter to configure the location of the log4j XML file or specify it as the system property, log4j.configuration.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@proteus.co)
